Chapter 2: Maternal Health Service Provision
10
1.1.1.4 In these field level VHSNDs the CHO should in coordination with ANM and ASHA, undertake all the 
important tasks to be done as per VHSND guidelines, like, ensuring 100 percent attendance of all ANC 
women enrolled in that VHSND, ANC check-up including blood pressure, sugar, haemoglobin etc., 
identification of high-risk pregnancy, immunization of ANC, IFA distribution, calcium distri
